upload.title: Import Your Data
upload.subtitle: Upload Excel or CSV files to import users, tickets, or custom fields
upload.dragDrop: Click or drag file to this area to upload
upload.support: Support for Excel (.xlsx) and CSV files only
upload.instructionsText: Select your import type and upload an Excel or CSV file. The system will automatically preview your data and guide you through the mapping process.
upload.errorFileType: You can only upload Excel (.xlsx) or CSV files!
upload.backendFailed: Backend connection failed! File will be processed locally.

result.title: Import Result
result.subtitle: Your mapping configuration is ready
result.importCompletedMessage: Import process completed successfully! You can copy the JSON configuration, download it as a file, or send it to the backend for processing.
result.modalMessage: Excel data will be sent to Grispi according to mapping configuration.
result.modalMessageBackend: mapping configuration will be sent to the backend for processing.
result.modalFooter: Total {mappedFields} fields mapped and {totalColumns} columns configured.

mapping.title: Field Mapping
mapping.subtitle: Map your Excel columns to Grispi fields
mapping.instruction: Select the appropriate Grispi field for each Excel column. You can save and load mapping templates for future use.
mapping.mappingProgress: fields mapped. All fields are mapped! Continue mapping or proceed to summary.
mapping.mappingProgressPartial: fields mapped. Continue mapping or proceed to summary.
mapping.templateInfo: This template will save {mappedCount} mapped fields for {importType} import type.
mapping.mapAtLeastOneField: You need to map at least one field!
mapping.mappingProgress: fields mapped. All fields are mapped! Continue mapping or proceed to summary.
mapping.mappingProgressPartial: fields mapped. Continue mapping or proceed to summary.

summary.title: Mapping Summary
summary.subtitle: Review your field mappings before proceeding
summary.mappingCompleted: Mapping completed successfully! {mappedFields} fields mapped. Use the navigation buttons to proceed to the final result.
summary.noFieldsMapped: No fields have been mapped. Please go back to the mapping step to configure field mappings.

preview.title: Data Preview
preview.subtitle: Review your data before mapping
preview.showingRows: Showing first 5 rows of {total} total rows.
preview.useNavigationButtons: Use the navigation buttons to proceed to field mapping.

errors.atLeastOneFieldRequired: At least one of these fields is required: {fields}
